name: Cantaloupe
overview: An AMOS based shareware puzzle game released in 1996. There were two versions of this game, a demo and the full shareware version. Full source code came with the full version. Cantaloupe is an addictive tile-based puzzle/path-finding game. It's based on an original C64 PD game, 'Sensitive', but a few extra tiles have been added. Go on, try it: you might even like it. Intended for use on an A1200.
